title: [GAMEPLAY] Urf Triumphant sounds not working
body:
I'm not sure this belongs in gameplay.
Since Patch 5.22 when placing the ward or it expiring, I no longer here the beautiful urf noises. 
Not only was that the main reason I bought the ward, but I also used the sounds as a helpful queue for when my ward died.

replies.body:
Hey Carvelmel,

Thanks for the report! 

Are you experiencing this when using a trinket? The trinket ward won't play the custom SFX for a ward due to gameplay. The SFX will play for Sightstone wards as well as pink wards.
Thank you for the reply. I can confirm that the issue is only for trinket wards. Though I'm sad to hear that it's how it is supposed to be. Is there any possibility on that being changed?
At this time, we don't have plans to modify the SFX for the wards.
